name: New Potatoes Tossed with Herb & Garlic Butter
description: New potatoes are small and thin skinned. Simply rinse, boil and serve.

ingredients.name: small new red or white potatoes

preparation: In Multipurpose Pot with salted water, cover and cook potatoes until fork tender. Drain well.
Add butter, olive oil and Herb & Garlic Dip Mix. Season to taste with Salt and Pepper. Toss potatoes to coat and serve immediately.
tips: Toss with melted butter and a sprinkling of Epicure Lemon Dilly Dip Mix or any favourite Epicure Seasoning.

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, parsley, & garlic.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.
